alert.note: Alert for Lyon; Osceola (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 16 at 7:05PM CDT until March 17 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Iowa and southwest Minnesota. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Patchy blowing snow may result in rapidly changing visibility, dropping to less than a half mile at times in open areas. Significant drifting snow along with ice-covered roads will result in hazardous conditions which could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Many highways in southwest Minnesota have been closed by the Minnesota Department of Transportion, and are expected to remain closed overnight. Please avoid travel unless it is an emergency.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
